transArray.content: The hotel is close to the place where you are traveling. The room is clean and the service is in place.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your comprehensive review and recognition has given us great encouragement and support. Every employee of the hotel has always adhered to the "customer-centered" service concept, making the hotel your other home away from home. The hotel room is equipped with a delivery robot, which saves you the trouble of going downstairs to retrieve items, allowing technology to change Our lifestyle, the front desk provides fruit snacks 24 hours a day, so you can be full of energy anytime and anywhere! Thank you for your support and look forward to your visit every time. I wish you success in your work! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
